note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: ### Welcome to AuShadha Welcome to the Home Page of AuShadha project. This is a initiative by me, a Paediatric Orthopaedic and Spine Surgeon practising at Coimbatore, India to develop and Open Source Initiative into Public Health Management. ###License GNU GPL v3 ### Technical Details Backend : Django 1.4 Frontend: Dojo 1.7.2 Dependencies: see docs/REQUIREMENTS.txt ### Contributors are welcome. Right now I am the maintainer. Contributions are welcome. Please drop me a line at dreaswar@gmail.com or at GitHub @dreaswar Visit http://www.dreaswar.com
name: Aushadha
tagline: AuShadha (औषध): Means medicine in Sanskrit. This is A Public Health Management System with Django back end and Dojo front end optimised for Indian Primary Health Setup but extensible and/or applicable elsewhere. AuShadha is GPLv3 Licensed.
